heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle1: A space for deep healing, care and transformation.
heroSubtitle2: We invite you to a journey of self-knowledge and expansion of consciousness through ancestral medicines, in a safe and respectful environment.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join our next ceremonies and start your path of healing and transformation. We have options in different parts of the country.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details here. Click save when you're done.

deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
pastCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore the experiences of those who have journeyed with us. Each video is a window into the transformation and healing that ancestral medicines can offer.
addVideoDescription: Add a new video to the gallery of past ceremonies.
videoFormUrlOrUpload: You must provide a URL or upload a file.
deleteVideoConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this video?
deleteVideoConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the video from the gallery.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is the first step to a profound and safe experience. Learn about the diet, and the mental and emotional recommendations to get the most out of your ceremony.
contactSanCarlosTitle: El Arte de Sanar - San Carlos
contactCommunityText: We are here to answer your questions and accompany you on your healing journey. Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or if you want more information about our ceremonies. Join our community and share experiences with people seeking a path of well-being and spiritual growth!

googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Fill in the details below to create your account.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Please check your email to verify your account.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the team that will accompany you on your healing journey.
editGuideDescription: Make changes to the guide's profile. Click save when you're done.
ayahuascaInfoTitle: Ancestral Medicine: What is Ayahuasca and How Does It Work?
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral brew used by indigenous cultures of the Amazon for healing and spiritual purposes. It is made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and other plants.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca acts as an inner guide, facilitating the exploration of consciousness and access to deep knowledge about oneself and the universe. Its purpose is to help you cleanse the body, release stagnant emotions, and reconnect with your true essence.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca helps you reconnect with your inner self, with nature, and with the divine. It facilitates the expansion of consciousness and the development of intuition. Through the ceremony, you can experience a deep connection with ancestral wisdom and the vital energy of the universe.
ceremonyBenefitsTitle: Benefits of the Ceremony: Clarity, Healing, and Liberation
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a greater understanding of yourself, your motivations, and your purpose in life through deep and revealing visions.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release traumas, fears, and emotional blockages that prevent you from moving forward on your path, healing past wounds and opening space for love and compassion.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Ayahuasca helps you reconnect with nature, value life, and understand the importance of caring for the planet. It facilitates the development of an ecological awareness and a commitment to sustainability.
groupCeremonyDescription: Live a transformative experience in a group (from 3 to 12 people), where the bond between participants is strengthened and a powerful collective energy is generated. Includes breakfast and lodging in a cozy cabin in Chachagua, San Carlos, or Guanacaste Casa Trinitos, surrounded by nature.
privateCeremonyDescription: We also offer individual ceremonies, tailored to your needs, with deep and personalized guidance. The location is chosen together, creating an intimate and sacred space for your healing process.
preparationProcessDescription: A 7-day vegetarian/vegan diet is recommended, avoiding red meats, processed foods, alcohol, marijuana and other drugs. It's crucial to report any medications you are taking.
ceremonyProcessDescription: Held in a sacred space with respect and safety. Chants, music, and prayers guide the connection.
experienceProcessDescription: Each journey is unique, with possible visions and intense emotions. We provide support throughout.
integrationProcessDescription: Time for reflection is key. We offer guidance to help integrate the teachings from your experience.
dietSubtitle: A special diet is key for preparation. Know the allowed and prohibited foods before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: Grains (rice, lentils, chickpeas, quinoa, oats, etc.)
Pure water (ideally filtered or spring water)
prohibitedFoodsList: Processed foods and fast food (canned, fried, industrial snacks)
mentalPrepSubtitle: Meditation and setting intentions are fundamental. Prepare your mind and heart for the experience.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca facilitates the healing of emotional traumas and the release of blockages that hinder your personal growth. Through the ceremony, you can access repressed memories, understand the origin of your emotional wounds, and release pain and suffering. The facilitators accompany you in this process, offering support and containment. It allows for deep transformation and the rebuilding of a full and meaningful life, free from the burdens of the past.
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for your comfort and to make the most of your experience.
comfortItemsList: Mat or pad (yoga or camping type)
essentialsList: Notebook or journal for your reflections
Object with meaning for your altar or intention (optional)
